alert.note: Alert for Carver; Scott; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 8:49PM CDT until May 24 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Rum River near St. Francis affecting Anoka County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Minnesota River near Jordan affecting Carver, Scott and Sibley Counties. Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River near Jordan. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying areas and some roads along the river begin to flood and private sanitary sewers may experience problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 745 PM CDT Saturday, the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 25.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.0 feet on 06/23/1996. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
